lead_paragraph: AGRUSA--Paula Triffo, 59, of Westwood, MA, passed away February 7, 2016. Survived by her beloved and devoted husband, Russell, with whom she founded and guided ICONICS, Inc. A full obituary is at: eatonfuneralhomes.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AGRUSA, PAULA TRIFFO
